<?php

// Remove Elementor from admin menu
add_action('admin_menu', function() {
    remove_menu_page('elementor');
}, 999);

// Block Elementor onboarding + app pages
add_action('admin_init', function() {
    if (isset($_GET['page']) && strpos($_GET['page'], 'elementor') !== false) {
        wp_safe_redirect(admin_url());
        exit;
    }
});

// Hide Elementor notices
add_action('admin_head', function() {
    echo '<style>.notice.elementor-message{display:none!important;}</style>';
});
